fields.name: log-level
fields.description: The log level: debug, info, warn, error

fields.name: log-level-debug-expires-at
fields.description: The timestamp indicating when debug-level logging should expire

fields.name: session-store-maximum-size
fields.description: The maximum size of the local in-memory session store cache in bytes.

fields.name: otel-collector-endpoint
fields.description: The endpoint of the OpenTelemetry collector to send observability data to (used for both tracing and logging if specific endpoints are not provided)

fields.name: otel-collector-endpoint-tls-cert-path
fields.description: Path to a file containing a PEM-encoded certificate to use as a CA for TLS connections to the OpenTelemetry collector

fields.name: otel-collector-endpoint-tls-cert
fields.description: A PEM-encoded certificate to use as a CA for TLS connections to the OpenTelemetry collector

fields.name: otel-collector-endpoint-tls-insecure
fields.description: Allow insecure connections to the OpenTelemetry collector

fields.name: health-check
fields.description: Enable the HTTP health check endpoint

fields.name: health-check-port
fields.description: Port for the HTTP health check endpoint

fields.name: health-check-bind-address
fields.description: Bind address for health check server (127.0.0.1 for localhost-only)

fields.name: account-hostname
fields.description: The hostname used to connect to the Databricks account API. If not set, it will be calculated from the hostname field.

fields.name: account-id
fields.description: The Databricks account ID used to connect to the Databricks Account and Workspace API

fields.name: databricks-client-id
fields.description: The Databricks service principal's client ID used to connect to the Databricks Account and Workspace API

fields.name: databricks-client-secret
fields.description: The Databricks service principal's client secret used to connect to the Databricks Account and Workspace API

fields.name: hostname
fields.description: The Databricks hostname used to connect to the Databricks API
